replies.message: We're glad to hear that, Joy! Thanks for being part of our community. -Tenaya

Oh so you only reply to some people tenaya ?? I am still waiting for you to answer my question !!!!! Are you trying to hide something from the community ??? IS FB  doing something they shouldn’t be ???  I just want my ticker restored as do many others, still not one reply to hundreds of messages for assistance 😡😡😡😡

Hi Siobhan. Regarding your ticker issue, please report the problem to us. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2jCxUhF. Additionally, you can learn more about the ticker in the Help Center: http://bit.ly/2jCxVCf. -Tenaya

Facebook oh for gods sake ! Do you think I’m an idiot ?  I have reported numerous times since 31st of October Tenaya!!!!!  Your stupid help says to click on icon , there is no icon it disappeared along with the ticker !!!! Hundreds of people across the world are reporting the same issue and you guys play dumb with auto responses and bull like above !! this is a serious issue obviously seeing as FB are unable to deal with it or even offer any sort of assistance apart from rubbish like you have just offered 😡😡😡😡
Facebook also have reported by pm , and guess what ? No reply either 😡
Facebook can you help me with my problem too? I messaged you many times but youre not responding
Facebook please consider our KCMP News badge from grey to blue badge, Thank You..

Ive been blocked for no reazon all of my messages were read and ignored im disabled and homebound so its my only connecttiom to anything and yet all tge creepers who use fake military profiles r left to stalk and scam now how is that riggt
